info.description: A production-ready REST API boilerplate in Go with JWT authentication
info.title: TRIIIO API Boilerplate

get.description: Get paginated list of all users with optional filtering (requires admin role)

parameters.description: Sort by field (created_at, updated_at, name, email)
parameters.name: sort

200.description: Success response with paginated user list

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password, returns access and refresh tokens

200.description: Success response with user data and tokens

500.description: Failed to authenticate user or generate token

post.description: Revoke refresh token and invalidate user session

403.description: Token does not belong to user

get.description: Get the currently authenticated user's information with roles

200.description: Success response with current user data

post.description: Exchange refresh token for new access and refresh tokens with automatic rotation

200.description: Success response with new token pair

403.description: Token reuse detected - all tokens revoked

post.description: Register a new user with name, email and password, returns access and refresh tokens

200.description: Success response with user data and tokens

500.description: Failed to register user or generate token

post.description: Send a simple email to one or more recipients
Send an email using a predefined HTML template

get.description: Get paginated list of properties with filters

parameters.description: Property type (APARTAMENTO, CASA, COMERCIAL, SALA_COMERCIAL, TERRENO, GALPAO)
parameters.name: tipo

parameters.description: Sort field (created_at, updated_at, preco, titulo, metragem)
parameters.name: sort

post.description: Import all published properties from dev-api-backend.pi8.com.br. Uses upsert logic - creates new properties and updates existing ones based on id_integracao mapping. Existing properties are detected via id_integracao field and updated with latest data. Attachments are deduplicated by URL.

200.description: Import completed with statistics (created, updated, failed counts)

get.description: Get a property by its ID
Get all attachments for a property

post.description: Add an image or document attachment to a property

get.description: Get all characteristics for a property

post.description: Add multiple characteristics to a property
Create a new slider with items

get.description: Retrieve a specific slider item by ID
Retrieve a slider and its items by location
Retrieve a slider and its items by ID

delete.description: Delete a slider and all its items

get.description: Retrieve all items for a specific slider

post.description: Add a new item to an existing slider

get.description: Get a user by their ID (requires authentication)

200.description: Success response with updated user data

400.description: Invalid user ID or Validation error

delete.description: Delete a user by ID (requires authentication)

get.description: Check if the application is running
Check if the application is alive (not deadlocked)
Check if the application and its dependencies are ready to serve traffic

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
